author: James Martin
method: Bring a saucepan of salted water to the boil and add the sprouts. Cook for 8-10 minutes, or until tender, then drain in a colander. Heat a frying pan over a high heat until hot. Add the olive oil and pancetta cubes and fry for 5-7 minutes, or until the pancetta is crisp and golden-brown. Add the drained sprouts and stir together to warm through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: salt,  900g/2lb 4oz Brussels sprouts, trimmed and loose leaves removed,  2 tsp olive oil,  225g/8oz pancetta, cut into cubes
